long_description: The men's REI Sariska Yoga jacket uses soft fabric with just the right amount of warmth to keep you feeling centered after you step out of the yoga studio. French terry cotton with a touch of spandex offers a soft feel, light insulation and two-way stretch. Zippered hand pockets shelter your hands, and an earphone portal works with your media player. Thumbholes cover wrists and enhance warmth. Raw seam detailing on shoulders. The active fit of the REI Sariska Yoga jacket offers a full range of motion.
